description:
In this video we take look at one of the most interesting Handheld gaming PCs of 2024! This is the Tecno Pocket Go and it’s basically a controller with a Full blown AMD Ryzen Powered Gaming console inside of a controller! It’s also paired up with set of AR glasses that offer a 215” screen and it’s the first X86 handheld to have a swappable 50Wh battery! With a Radeon iGPU and 16gb of ram this handheld gaming console can game!

Learn more here: https://tecno-pocketgo.com/
Back the kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/tecno-pocketgo/worlds-first-ar-windows-11-gaming-handheld-computer

Follow Me On Twitter: https://twitter.com/theetaprime
Follow Me On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/etaprime/

title: Tecno Pocket GO Hands On | This Controller is Actually A Gaming PC!
